subject: Pro x vs plus x
description_text:
Hi can you tell me the differences between the pro x and plus x pedal sets?

I am not interested in the led functions however I would like to add the
haptic motors.

Is there any other functional differences that make the pro pedals better?

Cheers. Tim

conversations.body_text: Hi Timothy Woodhouse,     If youâ€™re not interested in the LED lighting, then the main differences are the 16-bit resolution and the adjustable hydraulic damping.  You can go with the PlusX, which performs almost the same as the ProX Ultra, and it also offers excellent compatibility with the VAM Pro.
